```
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt install code
```

```
From RPi.gpio import LED
Red_led = LED(17)
Red_led.blink(on_time=1, off_time=1)
```

```
Import-Module Microsoft.PowerShell.IoT
while ($true) {
    Set-GpioPin -Id 17 -Value "High"
    Write-Host "LED on"
    Start-Sleep 1
    Set-GpioPin -Id 17 -Value "Low"
    Write-Host "LED off"
    Start-Sleep 1
}
```
